alert.note: Alert for Burnet; Llano; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 28 at 6:30AM CDT until October 28 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Williamson County in south central Texas... Northwestern Travis County in south central Texas... Southeastern Llano County in south central Texas... Burnet County in south central Texas... * Until 715 AM CDT. * At 630 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highland Haven, or near Kingsland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Burnet, Marble Falls, Kingsland, Bertram, Buchanan Dam, Lago Vista, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Meadowlakes, Highland Haven, Inks Lake State Park, Watson, Oatmeal, Sunnylane, Longhorn Cavern State Park, Joppa, Smithwick, Shady Grove, Spicewood and Cottonwood Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging winds, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
